label: [inject] jsonata support for both payload and other properties
info:
[JSONata](https://jsonata.org/) is a templating language for JSON content.

Seems very niche but beloved by Node-RED users.

It is very useful in the context of Node-RED (i.e. low code) since it does save using a function node for many small operations.

rules.to: hello world: to a string value
hello world: to a string value
